ComicInfo.Title: All in! Part 3
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: All in! Part 3: Genghis dons Serpentor's costume and dubs himself Serpentor-Khan, Cobra's new leader. Dr. Mindbender still intends to copy Sean's mind in the Brainwave Scanner, thinking he has the original Snake Eyes in his grasp - but Laura is determined to free Sean to repay her debt to him. Duke's reinforcements land on Cobra Island while Storm Shadow and Sean's father also enter the scene.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 12:17:40. [CVDB948168] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:38:21. [Issue ID 2443500]
